text: Hi Emma - I run <https://invoicescheduler.weaveandblend.com/|Invoice Scheduler for Xero> which you might have seen on the app store. We also do custom integrations so happy to chat about your use case. You can reach me on <mailto:harry@weaveandblend.com|harry@weaveandblend.com> or <https://meetings.HubSpot.com/hbevan|book a call> with me

Hi Guys

I have a question regarding the HubSpot API and Landing Pages. I have created a custom module with a text field called "Event title", I have added this module to a template and created multiple landing pages from that template. But the Event title field is not appearing in the HubSpot API for most landing pages even it contains the data. Please help me troubleshoot this issue.

Hi, is it possible to setup a site in content staging in one instance of HubSpot (Sandbox) and then migrate to another instance (the clients). Scenario = client has a current COS site and we are building a new one, trying to minimise disruption.
You can do this with theme assets, but not content objects (pages, CTAs, forms, etc…) without some custom API usage.
Has the developer day started? there is nothing on the event link to join :thinking_face:
i had this problem as well, if you register again it says “join event”
i guess there was something wrong with my registration
aaah awesome, that did the trick, thanks!
Hey, I wasnt able to register on time and I was wondering If I can still participate in the event.
Hey Chris, you should still be able to register and join here: <https://events.HubSpot.com/events/details/HubSpot-HubSpot-global-presents-developer-day-2021/>
I get a message saying registration is closed
Thank you so much everyone for this amazing developer day!
<@UCDCS9KCP> I'm now trying to do the same. Did you ever get an answer to this?
